Authentication Security: Implemented JWT authentication to fortify the application's security, ensuring that only authorized users can access resources and features.
Backend API Development: Leveraged Node.js technologies to craft efficient and scalable backend APIs, facilitating seamless communication between the frontend and backend components of the application.
Advanced Filtering Options: Introduced a diverse array of filters within the application, enabling users to easily customize their search based on specific preferences. This enhancement significantly improved the user experience.
Payment Gateway Integration: Successfully integrated a secure payment gateway, enabling users to make transactions confidently and conveniently. Users can now pay for their booked hotels directly through the application.
